post:
Hi Folks,

Happy to present the first offer in a while.

All offers listed below are XEN PV and come with 15GB offsite backup space (FTP+RSYNC) on request.

NL Servers in Snelserver
USA Servers with ioflood (operate own network in PhoenixNAP)

**NETHERLANDS**

**------EUVPS128------**

2 Cores - Equal Share
128MB RAM
128MB SWAP
6GB Raid 10 HDD Space
300 GB Transfer 
1 x IP4
5 x IP6
